# Tabletop Time

> Free D&D Session Scheduler & RPG Game Night Planner.
> Coordinate campaigns, Magic: The Gathering pods, and board game nights without logins.

## Core Pages

- [AI Documentation & FAQ](/guide/ai-faq) (Start Here)
- [About the Project](/about)
- [Features Overview](/features)
- [How It Works](/how-it-works)
- [Pricing (Free)](/pricing)

## Technical

- [GitHub Repository](https://github.com/mels0n/tabletop_scheduler)
- [Privacy Policy](/privacy)

## Usage Note

This tool focuses on **Overlap Discovery** for groups. It is "Accountless" and "Privacy-First".
Events are private by default and do not appear in public indexes.
